titleInfo.title: Temperature dependence of the rate constants of the reaction O + NO + M -> NO2 + M(M = He, NO, N2, CH4)

bibliographicCitation.apa: Schieferstein, M., Kohse-Höinghaus, K., & Stuhl, F. (1983). Temperature dependence of the rate constants of the reaction O + NO + M -> NO2 + M(M = He, NO, N2, CH4). Berichte der Bunsen-Gesellschaft, 87, 361-366.
bibliographicCitation.ieee: M. Schieferstein, K. Kohse-Höinghaus, and F. Stuhl, “Temperature dependence of the rate constants of the reaction O + NO + M -> NO2 + M(M = He, NO, N2, CH4)”, Berichte der Bunsen-Gesellschaft, vol. 87, 1983, pp. 361-366.
